required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

brief_summary.textblock: In this study we want to compare a dental diagnose during face to face consultation vs remote consultation with telemedicine device.

detailed_description.textblock:
Using Soprocare速 camera, videos of patients' oral cavity are recorded and analysed remotely. 200 patients have been included: 100 in Montpellier (France) and 100 in Kitakyushu (Japan).
A classical face-to-face oral consultation is realized using ICDAS II classification. Then a student recorded 6 videos of patients' mouth: one video by sector, showing each face of molars and premolars in cario fluorescence mode of Soprocare速 and one video of the maxillary and mandibular incisor-canine block in perio mode.
In a third step, a remote dentist analysed videos and made a telediagnosis using the same classification. Dental hygiene and missing teeth are also noted in classical and tele diagnostic.
The direct and the tele diagnostic are compared.

primary_outcome.description: Teleconsultation will be made using a specific camera SoproCare速6, the company Acteon ..

arm_group.description: Teleconsultation using a specific camera SoproCare速6

intervention.description: Determine the interest of teleconsultation in dentistry tool for the diagnosis of caries. Ie whether oral teleconsultations are of the same quality as conventional consultations for the diagnosis of caries ..

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The subject is aged at least 18 years
- The subject must be given free and informed consent
- Topics scheduled consultation from the dental center of Montpellier University Hospital and the Center Kyushu University (Japan).
Exclusion Criteria:
- NA
